title: They just need gun control
author: VD
content_html:
From the Telegraph:

A 15-year-old schoolboy yesterday became the third teenager to be shot dead in south London within a fortnight. The latest shooting has led Sir Ian Blair, the Metropolitan Police Commissioner, to call for an urgent meeting of commanders and murder squad detectives.

Oh, wait a minute…. Well, if a complete ban on firearms doesn’t do the trick, surely enough urgent meetings will!
